name: fullstack-open-mooc-part3
description: Exercise submissions for Full Stack open part-3-backend by University of Helsinki. https://fullstackopen.com/en/part3/node_js_and_express#exercises-3-1-3-6

scripts.build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist && cd ../fullstack-open-mooc/part2/phonebook && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item dist -Recurse ../../../fullstack-open-mooc-part3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy
